title: Visions of the Feminine in Laurel's Kitchen pt 1 & Is Our Planet too Small for Cows?
description: How an unlikely book from an unlikely place and time planted in my heart a vision of the feminine vocation. Plus, why going vegetarian/vegan does not save animals or the planet.
